audioText: Elle reverra sûrement son ancien professeur de musique lors de la cérémonie de remise des diplômes du conservatoire.
question: When will she likely see her former music teacher again?
options: During her next private music lesson
At the annual school concert performance
When visiting the music school library
explanation: The text states 'Elle reverra sûrement son ancien professeur de musique lors de la cérémonie de remise des diplômes du conservatoire.' - 'She will surely see her former music teacher again at the conservatory graduation ceremony.' The future form 'reverra' comes from 'revoir' (to see again).
